main event: On May 11, 1954, observers reported round pale orange objects flying in a V formation at Keesler AFB, Biloxi, Mississippi.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 2 seconds,7 to 9 objects were observed in total,The objects emitted a low-pitched fluttering sound,The formation flew in an arc from 45 degrees to overhead,The observation was considered solid by the reporting analysts.
witness description: An observer attending an open-air movie.
